article: rebuffed in last-minute attempts to reach multiyear agreements with two of their top free agents , the red sox saturday night went in separate directions with the pair , offering salary arbitration to cliff floyd and withholding it from ugueth urbina .
abstract: sox set urbina adrift ; floyd gets arbitration
